name: The Novice
flavorText: Fresh on the trading floor, eager to learn.

name: The Suit
flavorText: All business, all the time. Numbers are their native language.

name: The Hero
flavorText: High risk, high reward. Always goes for the big play.

name: The Bot
flavorText: Executes trades with cold, hard logic. Emotion is a variable.

name: The Glitch
flavorText: Exploits market inefficiencies. Thrives in chaos.

name: The Gamer
flavorText: Sees the market as one big MMO. Here for the high score.

name: The Rocketeer
flavorText: To the moon! Believes in every investment.

name: The Flash
flavorText: High-frequency trader. In and out before you blink.

name: The Phoenix
flavorText: Rises from the ashes of every bad trade, stronger than before.

name: The Star
flavorText: A media darling. Moves markets with a single tweet.

name: The Monarch
flavorText: Old money. Their portfolio has a royal lineage.

name: The Veteran
flavorText: Seen it all. Bear markets, bull markets, you name it.

name: The Oracle
flavorText: Seems to know what the market will do before it does.

name: The Ghost
flavorText: An anonymous whale. Their trades move in silence.

name: The Architect
flavorText: Builds portfolios like monuments, meant to last for ages.
